TradingPartnerId.description: Unique internal identifier defined by SPS Commerce which identifies the relationship

TsetPurposeCode.description: Code identifying purpose or function of the transmission

ReportTypeCode.description: Code indicating the title or contents of a document, report, or supporting item

ActionCode.description: Code indicating the type of action

ExchangeRate.description: The rate to be applied to convert one currency to another

Vendor.description: Number assigned by buyer that uniquely identifies the vendor

Division.description: Different entities belonging to the same parent company

Department.description: Name or number identifying an area wherein merchandise is categorized within a store

DepartmentDescription.description: Free form text to describe the name or number identifying an area wherein merchandise is categorized within a store

DateTimeQualifier.description: Code specifying the type of date

Time.description: All standard XML formats are accepted.

ContactTypeCode.description: Code identifying a type of contact

items.description: This group should be used if the associated normalized fields already contain information.

ContactReference.description: Additional field to clarify a contact

AddressTypeCode.description: Code identifying an organizational entity, a physical location, property, or an individual

LocationCodeQualifier.description: Code identifying the structure or format of the related location number[s]

AddressLocationNumber.description: Unique value assigned to identify a location

AddressName.description: Primary free-form textual description of a location

AddressAlternateName.description: Additional free-form description of a location

AddressAlternateName2.description: Additional free-form description of a location

State.description: Code[Standard State/Province] as defined by appropriate government agency

PostalCode.description: International postal zone excluding punctuation and blanks[Zip Code for United States]

Country.description: Human readable description identifying the country

LocationID.description: Provides further description to the address information. This can be either text or an ID

AddressTaxIdNumber.description: Unique number assigned by the relevant tax authority to identify a party for use in relation to Value Added Tax[VAT]

ReferenceQual.description: Code specifying the type of data in the ReferenceID/ReferenceDescription

Description.description: Free-form textual description to clarify the related data elements and their content
examples: New products only. Do not reuse packaging

Time.description: All standard XML formats are accepted.

ReferenceQual.description: Code specifying the type of data in the ReferenceID/ReferenceDescription

items.description: This group should be used if the associated normalized fields already contain information.

ContactReference.description: Additional field to clarify a contact

Time.description: All standard XML formats are accepted.

Description.description: Free-form textual description to clarify the related data elements and their content
examples: New products only. Do not reuse packaging

Time.description: All standard XML formats are accepted.

ReferenceQual.description: Code specifying the type of data in the ReferenceID/ReferenceDescription

NoteCode.description: Code specifying the type of note

Note.description: Free-form textual description of the note

LanguageCode.description: Code designating the language used in text. ISO 639 language code

items.description: Indicates that the related item[s] are following the specified government or industry rules regarding material, manufacturing process and or end product

RegulatoryComplianceQual.description: Code indicating the act or legislation

YesOrNoResponse.description: Code indicating a Yes or No condition or response

RegulatoryComplianceID.description: The ID relating to the RegulatoryComplianceQual, if applicable

RegulatoryAgency.description: Used to indicate the organization responsible for validating or enforcing the RegulatoryComplianceQual when not otherwise specified by the RegulatoryComplianceQual

Description.description: Free-form textual description to clarify the related data elements and their content
examples: New products only. Do not reuse packaging

items.description: Contains one or more group elements

ClassificationDescription.description: Free form text that describes the Classification

SubClassificationDescription.description: Free form text that describes the SubClassification

ProductType.description: Used to define the item's lowest classification level

LineSequenceNumber.description: For an initiated document, this is a unique number for the line item[s]. For a return transaction, this number should be the same as what was received from the source transaction.

ApplicationId.description: ERP generated code to uniquely identify the item

ConsumerPackageCode.description: Consumer level or customer unit product identification number

EAN.description: International Article Number, aka European Article Number, which is the European equivalent of the United States UPC[Universal Product Code]

GTIN.description: Global Trade Item Number which is an item identifier that encompasses all product identification numbers such as UPC, EAN, ITF, etc. and can be assigned at various packing levels

UPCCaseCode.description: Package or case level product identification number

NatlDrugCode.description: National Drug Code or NDC is a unique, universal product identifier for drugs. Primarily used in the pharmaceutical industry

InternationalStandardBookNumber.description: ISBN is a unique number assigned to every book before publication

PartNumberQual.description: Qualifier describing the additional product identification numbers not defined in specific fields at the line level

PartNumber.description: Additional product identification numbers not defined in specific fields at the line level

PurchasePriceType.description: Code identifying the type of price

PurchasePrice.description: Agreed upon price the buyer is paying for the line item

PurchasePriceBasis.description: Code specifying the type of unit price for an item

ProductSizeCode.description: Vendor/Buyer assigned size code. NRF codes should go in the NRFStandardColorAndSize fields

ProductSizeDescription.description: Free-form textual description of the product size

ProductColorCode.description: Vendor/Buyer assigned color code. NRF codes should go in the NRFStandardColorAndSize fields

ProductColorDescription.description: Free-form textual description of the product color

ProductMaterialCode.description: Vendor/Buyer assigned fabric code/material code. NRF codes should go in the NRFStandardColorAndSize fields

ProductMaterialDescription.description: Free-form textual description of the item's primary material/fabric

Department.description: Name or number identifying an area wherein merchandise is categorized within a store

DepartmentDescription.description: Free form text to describe the name or number identifying an area wherein merchandise is categorized within a store

Gender.description: Description used to identify the primary gender[and age] for which an item is designed.

MaintenanceTypeCode.description: Code to identify the action that is applied to associated level

NRFColorCode.description: Standardized National Retail Federation Code describing the color of the product

ColorCategoryName.description: A name describing a group of associated colors

ColorPrimaryDescription.description: Human readable text defining the color code

NRFSizeCode.description: Standardized National Retail Federation Code describing the size of the product

SizeCategoryName.description: A name describing a group of associated sizes

SizePrimaryDescription.description: Human readable text defining the size code

SizeSecondaryDescription.description: Additional human readable text defining the size code

items.description: This group is to link item attributes that are talking about the same part of the item. Only once per MasterItemAttribute can a specific ItemAttributeQualifier be used
This group describes a part of an item

ItemAttributeQualifier.description: Code identifying the part of an item being described.

ValueUOM.description: The unit of measure of the numeric value of the ItemAttributeQualifier

Description.description: Free-form textual description to clarify the related data elements and their content
examples: New products only. Do not reuse packaging

YesOrNoResponse.description: Code indicating a Yes or No condition or response

MeasurementQualifier.description: Code identifying a specific product to which a measurement applies

MeasurementSignificanceCode.description: Code used to qualify or further define a measurement value

IndustryCodeQualifier.description: Code indicating a code from a specific industry code list

PackQualifier.description: Code to identify the pack hierarchical level

PackValue.description: The number of units inside the PackQualifier

PackSize.description: Measurable size of the sellable unit

PackUOM.description: Unit of measure for the PackSize

PackingMedium.description: Code identifying the type of packaging

PackingMaterial.description: Code identifying the type of packaging material

WeightQualifier.description: Code defining the type of weight

PackWeight.description: Numeric value of total weight in reference to the PackQualifier or PalletQualifier

PackWeightUOM.description: Code specifying the units in which the PackWeight is being measured by

PackVolume.description: Numeric value of volume per unit of measure in reference to the PackQualifier or PalletQualifier

PackVolumeUOM.description: Code specifying the units in which the PackVolume is being measured by

PackLength.description: The larger horizontal dimension of your pack, as defined by the PackQualifer, when the pack is in the upright position

PackWidth.description: The smaller horizontal dimension of your pack, as defined by the PackQualifier, when the pack is in the upright position

PackHeight.description: The vertical dimension of your pack, as defined by the PackQualifer, when the pack is in the upright position

DimensionUOM.description: Code specifying the units in which the length, width, or height is being measured by

Description.description: Free-form textual description to clarify the related data elements and their content
examples: New products only. Do not reuse packaging

PalletQualifier.description: Code to identify the pallet hierarchical level

PalletValue.description: The number of units inside the PalletQualifier

PalletTypeCode.description: Code indicating the type of material of the pallet

PalletTiers.description: The number of vertical layers on the pallet

PalletBlocks.description: The number of units per horizontal layer on the pallet

DimensionUOM.description: Code specifying the units in which the length, width, or height is being measured by

WeightQualifier.description: Code defining the type of weight

PalletWeight.description: Numeric value of total weight in reference to the PalletQualifier

PalletWeightUOM.description: Code specifying the units in which the PalletWeight is being measured by

PalletVolume.description: Numeric value of volume per unit of measure in reference to the PalletQualifier

PalletVolumeUOM.description: Code specifying the units in which the PalletVolume is being measured by

UnloadedHeight.description: The vertical dimension of your pallet when not loaded

UnloadedHeightUOM.description: Unit of measure used in relation with the UnloadedHeight

PalletStructureCode.description: Code identifying the style of the pallet

ReferenceQual.description: Code specifying the type of data in the ReferenceID/ReferenceDescription

Description.description: Free-form textual description to clarify the related data elements and their content
examples: New products only. Do not reuse packaging

Time.description: All standard XML formats are accepted.

ReferenceQual.description: Code specifying the type of data in the ReferenceID/ReferenceDescription

NoteCode.description: Code specifying the type of note

Note.description: Free-form textual description of the note

LanguageCode.description: Code designating the language used in text. ISO 639 language code

FloorReadyRequired.description: Code indicating whether the retailer requires the item to be floor ready

FloorReadyTypeCode.description: Indicates the type of Floor Ready instructions being sent in a repetition of the Floor Ready group

FloorReadyDescription.description: Free-form description explaining the Floor Ready requirements.

FloorReadyID.description: Retailer assigned reference number associated with the FloorReadyType

DateTimeQualifier.description: Code specifying the type of date

Time.description: All standard XML formats are accepted.

MeasurementQualifier.description: Code identifying a specific product to which a measurement applies

MeasurementSignificanceCode.description: Code used to qualify or further define a measurement value

IndustryCodeQualifier.description: Code indicating a code from a specific industry code list

PriceTypeIDCode.description: Code identifying the type of price

UnitPrice.description: Price as defined by the PriceTypeIDCode

UnitPriceBasis.description: Code specifying the type of unit price for an item

UnitPriceBasisMultiplier.description: Value to be used as a modifier to obtain a new UnitPriceBasis.

PriceMultiplierQual.description: Code indicating the type of price multiplier

PriceMultiplier.description: Value to be used as a multiplier to obtain a new price

MultiplePriceQuantity.description: Quantity of units for a given price [i.e. 3 for $10.00].

ClassOfTradeCode.description: Self defined categories used to indicate who is authorized to view or use the related price information contained in the PriceInformation or PricingType group

Description.description: Free-form textual description to clarify the related data elements and their content
examples: New products only. Do not reuse packaging

items.description: This group is used to communicate the geographical location[s] restrictions for the parent PriceDetails group

PricingAreaQualifier.description: Code used to identify the location[s]

PricingAreaIdentifier.description: Used to communicate the value as defined by the PricingAreaQualifier

items.description: Specialized quantities that may be defined by location and/or dates

QuantityQualifier.description: Qualifier used to define the type of quantity to follow

TotalQty.description: Numeric value of the total quantity

TotalQtyUOM.description: The unit of measure for the numeric value of the total quantity

QuantityDescription.description: Free-form text to further describe the QuantityQualifier
examples: Quantities on hold due to defect

LocationCodeQualifier.description: Code identifying the structure or format of the related location number[s]

LocationDescription.description: Generic description to explain all the location quantities. i.e. Bin Number, Warehouse, Stockroom

Location.description: For CrossDock, it's the marked for location. For MultiStore[could also be DC] ship-to location

DateTimeQualifier.description: Code specifying the type of date

Time.description: All standard XML formats are accepted.

LeadTimeCode.description: Code indicating the time range that applies to LeadTimePeriodInterval, LeadTimeQuantity, and LeadTimeDate

LeadTimeQuantity.description: The amount of time allowed to fulfill the primary function of the transaction

LeadTimePeriodInterval.description: Code indicating the units of time that apply to the LeadTimeQuantity

LeadTimeDate.description: Date that indicates when a LeadTimeCode takes effect

TaxTypeCode.description: Identification of the type of duty, tax, or fee applicable to commodities or of tax applicable to services

TaxPercentQual.description: Code indicating on what basis a tax percent is calculated

TaxPercent.description: The percentage that is applied to determine the tax amount. Percentages should be represented as real numbers[0% through 100% should be normalized to 0.0 through 100.00]

JurisdictionQual.description: Code identifying the source of the data used in the Tax JurisdictionCode

JurisdictionCode.description: Code represents the City, State, or Providence[tax authority] associated with the Tax group

TaxExemptCode.description: Code indicating whether the header or item level data is exempt[or not exempt] for the tax and taxing authority indicated in JurisdictionCode

RelationshipCode.description: Code identifying whether the tax amount is included in the total transaction amount

PercentDollarBasis.description: Monetary amount that is used when calculating a tax, allowance, or charge amount.

TaxHandlingCode.description: Code indicating method of handling for a tax

TaxID.description: Number assigned to a purchaser[buyer, orderer] by a tax jurisdiction[state, country, etc]

Description.description: Free-form textual description to clarify the related data elements and their content
examples: New products only. Do not reuse packaging

AllowChrgIndicator.description: Code which indicates an allowance or charge for the service specified

AllowChrgCode.description: Code describing the type of allowance or charge for the service specified

AllowChrgAgencyCode.description: Code identifying the agency assigning the code values

AllowChrgAgency.description: Agency maintained code identifying the service, promotion, allowance, or charge

AllowChrgAmt.description: Amount of the allowance or charge

AllowChrgPercentQual.description: Code indicating on what basis an allowance or charge percent is calculated

AllowChrgPercent.description: Percentage of allowance or charge. Percentages should be represented as real numbers[0% through 100% should be normalized to 0.0 through 100.00]

PercentDollarBasis.description: Monetary amount that is used when calculating a tax, allowance, or charge amount.

AllowChrgRate.description: Value expressed in monetary currency that applies to the given quantity [i.e. The rate is $5.00 off one dozen]. [AllowChrgRate, AllowChrgQty, AllowChrgQtyUOM fields should all be sent in conjunction with each other]

AllowChrgQtyUOM.description: The unit of measure used in relation with AllowChrgQty[AllowChrgRate, AllowChrgQty, AllowChrgQtyUOM fields should all be sent in conjunction with each other]

AllowChrgQty.description: Numeric value of quantity to which the allowance or charge applies[AllowChrgRate, AllowChrgQty, AllowChrgQtyUOM fields should all be sent in conjunction with each other]

AllowChrgHandlingCode.description: Code indicating method of handling for an allowance or charge

AllowChrgHandlingDescription.description: Free-form textual description of the allowance or charge
examples: This will cover the cost of shipping

LanguageCode.description: Code designating the language used in text. ISO 639 language code

CalculationSequence.description: Used to indicate at what point a value should be used in calculations where orders of operations matter [i.e. 1 would indicate that the related value should be taken first].

TaxTypeCode.description: Identification of the type of duty, tax, or fee applicable to commodities or of tax applicable to services

TaxPercentQual.description: Code indicating on what basis a tax percent is calculated

TaxPercent.description: The percentage that is applied to determine the tax amount. Percentages should be represented as real numbers[0% through 100% should be normalized to 0.0 through 100.00]

JurisdictionQual.description: Code identifying the source of the data used in the Tax JurisdictionCode

JurisdictionCode.description: Code represents the City, State, or Providence[tax authority] associated with the Tax group

TaxExemptCode.description: Code indicating whether the header or item level data is exempt[or not exempt] for the tax and taxing authority indicated in JurisdictionCode

RelationshipCode.description: Code identifying whether the tax amount is included in the total transaction amount

PercentDollarBasis.description: Monetary amount that is used when calculating a tax, allowance, or charge amount.

TaxHandlingCode.description: Code indicating method of handling for a tax

TaxID.description: Number assigned to a purchaser[buyer, orderer] by a tax jurisdiction[state, country, etc]

Description.description: Free-form textual description to clarify the related data elements and their content
examples: New products only. Do not reuse packaging

StatusCode.description: Code indicating the status of an order or shipment or the disposition of any difference between the quantity ordered and the quantity shipped for a line item or transaction

CarrierTransMethodCode.description: Code specifying the method or type of transportation for the shipment

CarrierAlphaCode.description: Standard Carrier Alpha Code[SCAC] - 2 to 4 digit alphabetic code assigned by the National Motor Freight Traffic Association identifying transportation companies

CarrierRouting.description: Free-form description of the routing/requested routing for shipment or the originating carrier's identity

EquipmentDescriptionCode.description: Code identifying type of equipment used for shipment

CarrierEquipmentInitial.description: Prefix or alphabetic part of an equipment unit's identifying number

CarrierEquipmentNumber.description: Sequencing or serial part of an equipment unit's identifying number[Pure numeric form for equipment number is preferred]

TransitDirectionCode.description: The point of origin and point of direction

ServiceLevelCode.description: Code indicating the level of transportation service or the billing service offered by the transportation carrier

AddressTypeCode.description: Code identifying an organizational entity, a physical location, property, or an individual

LocationCodeQualifier.description: Code identifying the structure or format of the related location number[s]

AddressLocationNumber.description: Unique value assigned to identify a location

AddressName.description: Primary free-form textual description of a location

AddressAlternateName.description: Additional free-form description of a location

AddressAlternateName2.description: Additional free-form description of a location

State.description: Code[Standard State/Province] as defined by appropriate government agency

PostalCode.description: International postal zone excluding punctuation and blanks[Zip Code for United States]

Country.description: Human readable description identifying the country

LocationID.description: Provides further description to the address information. This can be either text or an ID

AddressTaxIdNumber.description: Unique number assigned by the relevant tax authority to identify a party for use in relation to Value Added Tax[VAT]

DateTimeQualifier.description: Code specifying the type of date

Time.description: All standard XML formats are accepted.

SealStatusCode.description: Code indicating condition of door seal upon arrival

SealNumber.description: Stamped lock that is on the container

SpecialHandlingCode.description: Code specifying special transportation handling instructions

Description.description: Free-form textual description to clarify the related data elements and their content
examples: New products only. Do not reuse packaging

YesOrNoResponse.description: Code indicating a Yes or No condition or response

UNIdentificationCode.description: Code identifying the hazardous material identification number as required by Title 49 of the code of Federal Regulations

CompartmentIDCode.description: Code indicating which compartment of a tank car the product is located in. Typically used in rail shipments

FlashpointTemperature.description: The lowest temperature at which the vapor of a liquid can be ignited in air

HazardousClassification.description: The hazardous classification corresponding to the shipping name of the hazardous commodity

ReferenceQual.description: Code specifying the type of data in the ReferenceID/ReferenceDescription

Description.description: Free-form textual description to clarify the related data elements and their content
examples: New products only. Do not reuse packaging

CommodityCodeQualifier.description: Code identifying the commodity coding system used for Commodity Code

CommodityCode.description: Code describing a commodity or group of commodities

Description.description: Free-form textual description to clarify the related data elements and their content
examples: New products only. Do not reuse packaging

items.description: Describes labels that are affixed to the product as well as their requirements

Required.description: Indicates if the related data is a requirement

LabelReason.description: Describes why a label is needed

State.description: Code[Standard State/Province] as defined by appropriate government agency

Country.description: Human readable description identifying the country

FOBPayCode.description: Code identifying payment terms for transportation charges

FOBLocationQualifier.description: Code identifying the party or location responsible for organizing and paying for transportation

FOBLocationDescription.description: Free-form textual description of the location at which ownership of goods is transferred

FOBTitlePassageCode.description: Code describing the location of ownership of the goods changes

FOBTitlePassageLocation.description: Location of ownership of the goods

TransportationTermsType.description: Code identifying the source of the transportation terms

TransportationTerms.description: Code that defines to the recipient what types of fees are associated with the movement of goods. By default, if you do not send the TransportationTermsType, you are using the standard codes from the Incoterms website [http://www.iccwbo.org/products-and-services/trade-facilitation/]

RiskOfLossCode.description: Code specifying which party should bear the burden for risk of damage occurring to goods after the sale but before delivery

Description.description: Free-form textual description to clarify the related data elements and their content
examples: New products only. Do not reuse packaging

items.description: Indicates that the related item[s] are following the specified government or industry rules regarding material, manufacturing process and or end product

RegulatoryComplianceQual.description: Code indicating the act or legislation

RegulatoryAgency.description: Used to indicate the organization responsible for validating or enforcing the RegulatoryComplianceQual when not otherwise specified by the RegulatoryComplianceQual

Description.description: Free-form textual description to clarify the related data elements and their content
examples: New products only. Do not reuse packaging

TotalAmount.description: Total amount of the transaction. Sum of the item qty * price +/- the charges, allowances, and taxes, if sent

TotalLineItemNumber.description: Sum of the total number of line items in this document

TotalQuantity.description: Sum of the total quantity of the line items in this document
